entry.content:
Hi,

I build and test the accessibility of websites.

Except clearly I have yet to prove that here. Apologies internet person, I will be adding some actual content in due course.

Alan Bristow

Me

I became somewhat obsessed with semantic HTML, and with CSS, starting in 2001 and that obsession only got worse when I read Designing with Web Standards by Jeffrey Zeldman in 2003. Hungry for more I moved on to Web Standards Solutions by Dan Cederholm in 2004, and CSS: The Definitive Guide by Eric Meyer.

I've now channeled these early web obsessions to focus on building websites, and auditing websites for accessibility.Â
